quote: ''It allows every Filipino the opportunity not only to become a graft buster but actively help prevent the commission of graft and corruption that leads to high prices, lack of job opportunities and income.''
''If you have relatives in government and all of you are clean, isn't that better than being the only one in government from you're family but you're quite corrupt.''

''I'm hoping that the current administration will study and reconsider this proposal for the benefit of the middle class and of the poor. If we want real change and inclusive growth to happen, we need to pass measures that will directly benefit the people.''

''We all want a just, inclusive lasting peace in Mindanao. But the proposed Bangsamoro Basic Law as framed mainly points to giving the Moro Islamic Liberation Front more power and access to billions, all without any clear and definite accountability to our national government.''

''In the case of Japan, they made it very clear that these islands are covered by the defense treaty. So that's what the Philippines wants and that's what the Filipinos need, I think, at this point in time?a very clear statement from the United States through their president saying that these islands, this area, is Philippine territory.''

''I think Charter Change will be very divisive and people will suspect that parliamentary will be equated with the return of the pork barrel because, remember, under a parliamentary system, the secretaries are also members of the legislature. I think it would be better if we don't make this a priority.? Let us first prioritize affordable prices
source: how the majority could feel the gains made in our economy.''

quote: ''Of course. We shouldn't have discrimination towards anyone. Equal rights to everyone.'' Interview with InterAksyon in Manila, Jan. 20, 2016

''Aside from increasing the allocations for CCT in the national budget to increase the number of beneficiaries, the government can expand the program further to provide capital to poor families and those who are victims of calamities and disaster as a mechanism for rehabilitation.''

''We must be vigilant and strengthen the protection of our labor force. Contractualization as a form of circumventing the law, that diminishes income, should be curtailed. Further, adequate social protection should be given to our workers, such as the proper distribution of their social security service (SSS) and PhilHealth benefits.''

''Kami ng sister ko, magkaiba kami. Ako ay against it. I am for the strengthening n'ong annulment. Ako ay naniniwala na p'wede nating i-democratize o maging mas madali sa court at mas mura para sa mga tao ang annulment. But hindi ko gusto na mapunta ang Pilipinas sa no-fault divorce na kung saan ang mag-asawa ay parang mag-boyfriend lang na kung saan sabihin mo lang na, ayoko na sa mukha mo, hindi ko na gusto, especially since there is so much inequality (between) men and women in the Philippines.''

QUALIFIED NO
''Hindi... Well, na-depose nga 'di ba? May issues nga ng Martial Law. But that's not for one man or one vice president to decide. It's a national consensus. And the president has that stand, I mean, Mayor Duterte has that stand.'' (Interview with InterAksyon, Jan. 20, 2016)

''Yes, but it has to be consistent with the laws of the economy. Hindi ako 'yong land use extremism, meaning halimbawa sasabihin mo, 'heto lahat farming,' tapos tiningnan mo, subdivision na, 'di ba?'' (Interview with InterAksyon, Jan. 20, 2016)

''Of course. Just by the name, ill-gotten wealth. If they prove that it is not ill-gotten, that's a different thing. But you cannot stop, not only Marcos, but all ill-gotten wealth.'' (Interview with InterAksyon, Jan. 20, 2016)

''We must be vigilant and strengthen the protection of our labor force. Contractualization as a form of circumventing the law, that diminishes income, should be curtailed. Further, adequate social protection should be given to our workers, such as the proper distribution of their social security service and PhilHealth benefits.''

''All personalities behind the pork barrel scam should be held accountable and face charges for abusing government funds. It's important that these individuals be prosecuted to show the administration's determination in ridding the country of corruption.''

'' 'Yong same sex unions, equality under the law, okay sa akin 'yon. 'Yong marriage, I also want to respect the religious beliefs of people. Kasi kapag sinabi mong respect the law, dalawang side yan eh. Hindi lang sa LGBT. Doon sa mga straight na naniniwala that marriage is for man and woman. Pero ang gusto ng mga LGBT is walang discrimination, meaning the legal benefits under the law ng marriage, meron din sila. And I think that forms part of the non-discrimination.''

''K-12 (might be) good on paper but there would eventually be higher percentage of drop out rate because of (the limited) financial resources of parents sending their children to school for two more years.''

QUALIFIED YES
''I think we should change the approach kasi no'ng araw, it's just a matter of 'yong farmers ay p'wedeng sa kanila lupa. Ngayon, iba na. I mean, it's not a yes or no question because if you're just going to give them the land pero walang support, ipali-lease nila o ibebenta ulit nila sa pinagbilhan nilang landowner. Now, if there's some kind of land reform pero may technical and financial support, ibang usapan 'yon. But the problem is, na-stuck ang Congress doon sa ibibigay ba ang lupa o hindi sa farmer, hindi kasama doon 'yong agri-research, agri-biz, and how to fix that.'' Interview with InterAksyon in Manila, January 20, 2016

QUALIFIED YES

''Nasa court 'yan. Hindi sa amin 'yan.'' Interview with InterAksyon in Manila, Jan. 20, 2016

''Kung eskwelahan 'yan (fund from DAP), paano isasauli ang eskwelahan? Kung ginamit sa dialysis 'yon, p'wede mo bang kunin 'yong gamot sa katawan no'ng nagpunta sa dialysis?... Kung ikukulong mo si Secretary (Florencio) Abad, ano magiging message no'n? Pag sumubok kang maging creative kahit 20 years gianagawa, ikukulong ka namin pag sinabi ng Supreme Court na unconstitutional?''
